.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_SAMPLER_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-pNext-pNext]] pname:pNext must: be `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkSamplerYcbcrConversionInfo
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-flags-zerobitmask]] pname:flags must: be `0`
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-magFilter-parameter]] pname:magFilter must: be a valid elink:VkFilter value
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-minFilter-parameter]] pname:minFilter must: be a valid elink:VkFilter value
* [[VUID-VkSamplerCreateInfo-mipmapMode-parameter]] pname:mipmapMode must: be a valid elink:VkSamplerMipmapMode value
